title: Singapore - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 6,000 BDT (Invitation by Chologhuri) + Additional translation/notary fees if required
validity: 2 months validity with 30 days stay, Double Entry

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport with minimum 6 months validity from travel date
Two recent color passport-size photos (35mm x 45mm, matte paper, white background)
Minimum personal bank balance of 70,000 BDT per person, maintained until passport return
NID card and notarized English translation of marriage certificate (if applicable)
Applicable documents depending on applicant type: job holder, businessperson, or student
All current and previous passports must be submitted
Only tourist and business visa categories are accepted; other types are not processed

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport (current and previous) with at least 6 months validity
Two recent passport-size photos (35mm x 45mm, no cap or glasses, white background)
Personal bank statement (last 6 months), salary slips (last 3 months), and solvency certificate (with seal and signature)
Marriage certificate (notarized and translated) if spouse name not on passport
For Job Holders: NOC, Office ID, GO for government employees, BMDC certificate for doctors, BAR Council certificate for lawyers, retirement certificate if applicable
For Business Persons: Office pad blank page, renewed trade license with English notarization, memorandum for limited companies
For Students: Student ID (both sides), birth certificate

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
